parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL link of image host

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful

parameters.name: shopid
parameters.description: Shop ID is the seller's unique identifier in Shopee's system

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Identify user's identity, using refresh_key to get token

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if request failed

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if any (may be empty)
